-- 【dgRv4.2.13 - SQL 異動】 修正v4.2.12的資料

-- Auto-generated SQL script #202407111537 , 修正 SUBITEM_NO 從中文改英文,Kevin Cheng
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='API_SCH_WAKE-UP'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='API 預定功能喚醒' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='FISHING_SCH_EN_API'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='撈取預定啟用 API' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_EN_STATE'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為啟用狀態' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='FISHING_SCH_DIS_API'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='撈取預定停用 API' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_DIS_STATE'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為停用狀態' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='FISHING_SCH_LA_API'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='撈取預定上架 API' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_LAUNCH_STATE'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為上架狀態' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='FISHING_SCH_RE_API'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='撈取預定下架 API' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
UPDATE dgr_dev.dbo.TSMP_DP_ITEMS
	SET SUBITEM_NO='CHANGE_REMOVAL_STATE'
	WHERE ITEM_NO='SCHED_MSG' AND SUBITEM_NO='變更為下架狀態' AND LOCALE='zh-TW';
